title: Typophile Support Badges
content:
Submitted by [Joe Pemberton](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906232216/http:/typophile.com/user/1160 "View user profile.") : 11.Dec.2007 6.02pm 

**What’s up with those little badges on peoples’ user icons?**

[
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906232216im_/http:/typophile.com/files/typ_sponsor-levels_5368.png)
](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906232216/http:/typophile.bigcartel.com/)

The concept is if you have sympathy, send Typophile $15. If you love Typophile, send $45. And, if it’s a true obsession, you can show it with a larger donation of $100.

When you support Typophile you’ll receive a badge to add to your user icon. Let other users know of your undying sympathy (shield), love (heart) obsession (drop of blood) for Typophile.

Also, if you purchased a tee in the last 12 months we’ll send you badge to match your approximate contribution. Some of you made other significant contributions this year. You won’t be forgotten.

**[Share the sympathy/love/obsession](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906232216/http:/typophile.com/ad/redirect/39853/) —\>**
author: Joe Pemberton
